channel.title: Project No-Doze V.02 (Client, Server and .sql)
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][b]I DID NOT UPLOAD THIS OR MAKE ANY PART OF THIS (Except The Download Mirrors) JUST WANTED TO SHARE THIS HERE BECAUSE NO ONE HAS POSTED IT FOR AWHILE AND IT IS A AMAZING SOURCE THAT MORE PEOPLE SHOULD USE[/b][/size][/center] [center][size=12pt]ALL Credits For Uploading & Writing This Thread Goes To CRS Hyperion On R-S.[/size][/center] I'm just re-uploading this as I found it on an old USB I had. The links are all dead on the topic so if someone wants to post it there too, I know people have been wanting it.
I don't want rep or anything like that, this is more a backup in case I lose it.
Download as a package (V.02 - original and untouched).
Your welcome: Uppit - http://uppit.com/ngabtc5rrufa/Original_No-Doze_[Client.Server.SQL].rar - NOT BROKEN COPY/PASTE IT (Mirrors Uploaded By Me ) DropBox - http://db.tt/om2bxWzR MediaFire - http://www.mediafire.com/?xjub8jqz57lq5rq
Original topic for features v1 MoparScape Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,483627.msg3543194.html Original topic for features v1/v2 R-S Link: http://www.rune-_____.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/304010-shards-project-no-doze-sql-intergrated-excellent-server.html
All credits go to Killamess for an epic source.

item.description:
@Elux wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:13, topic:435641”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=538361.msg3938883#msg3938883 date=1331256657]

Nice, I remember someone hosting this and it was so fun.

Old School Prestige by Mendorphins?

Maybe, I don’t remember. It was a big leech, but it got enough donations to thrive for a couple months before it was removed because the owner was a dick head.
[/quote]
Oh no, he had the beta up for like 2-3 weeks and then shut it down cus he did a drop party and messed up the eco.[/quote]

^ pissed, so many servers shut down because of a shit economy

Read full topic
